short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A popup window shows Shaan Puri's Web3 newsletter **Milk Road**. Don't miss the best Web3 newsletter in the universe.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We all know web3 is super interesting, but most people don't have the time to keep up with everything. 

It will show you the current price of Bitcoin and Ethereum. Yes, just two of the top crypto coins in the world. It will take you straight into the Milk Road newsletter.

Think of this newsletter like your smart, no-bullshit friend, whispering sweet web3 nothings into your ear every morning. It's called Milk Road, because in ancient Greece....just kidding, it's just a funny name.

The MilkRoad newsletter does two things:

1. Explain what's going on in web3, in plain jane English
2. Make you laugh

This extension does just one thing:

After installing, whenever you click the icon, it will show you the up to date price of Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) in your cute little window and a chance to pop over to read the world best Web3 and Crypto newsletter.

This extension is made with ❤️ by Mr Marketing Mustache at https://MrMarketingMustache.com

Other super extensions from the developer:

The following Chrome extension will show the top 10 Crypto prices in your currency (USD, GBP, CAD, EUR, AUD, INR). No Ads, No tracking, Just prices.

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/crypto-prices-in-your-fav/pjnmkfgkdllcahcdjnpeclbkgemdnjed
